ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Re: how to build heritrix with maven
ygData.msgSnippet: The error in the below is the change log report trying to get cvs logs from sourceforge. Fix up your cvs access or just don t run maven goals that run report

User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; PPC Mac OS X Mach-O; en-US; rv:1.7b) Gecko/20040421

From: stack <stack@...>
Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Re: how to build heritrix with maven
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=168599281

The error in the below is the change log report trying to get cvs logs 
from sourceforge. Fix up your cvs access or just don't run maven goals 
that run report creation (Are you doing site:generate or xdoc?).   If 
you use the jar/dist targets, you shouldn't run into the below issue.
Yours,
St.Ack
